name: Modern Sky Storm: F18 Simulator Shooting Air-plane Jet Flight War Combat HD
name_original: Modern Sky Storm: F18 Simulator Shooting Air-plane Jet Flight War Combat HD
description:
In an era where two different military factions control the fate of the world, military technology has created some of the world's most devastating war jets. Utilizing arcade-style gameplay, choose your trusty war bird to dominate the skies and enemies.

*Collect coins to unlock new jets and use power-ups to turn the tide of war in your favor!
*Compete against your friends using Game Center for the highest score!
